description.ko: 가상 공간에서 생동감 넘치는 빛의 입자와 기하학적 추상을 통해 음파를 시각화하여 음향 공명의 본질을 포착한 매혹적인 디지털 아트 작품입니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing digital art piece visualizing sound waves through vibrant, flowing light particles and geometric abstractions, capturing the essence of acoustic resonance in a virtual space.

prompt: High-resolution digital visualization of sound waves, ECHO-0 aesthetic, kinetic light particles, oscillating geometric patterns, deep blue and neon violet color palette, fluid motion, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, synthwave influence, abstract representation of acoustic resonance.
